document.full_text: top global miner bhp billiton  sees the global economy remaining fragile in the near term and warned that economic growth could slow in the medium term, echoing recent comments from rival rio tinto .
document.title: bhp billiton sees fragile global economy near-term
lines_and_colors: top global miner bhp billiton  sees the global economy remaining fragile in the near term and warned that economic growth could slow in the medium term, echoing recent comments from rival rio tinto .
